sub_tasks.questions: I am planning to travel from Dubai to Los Angeles on 2024-12-20. Please check the fastest flight from Dubai to Los Angeles on that day and confirm if this flight offers a vegetarian meal option. After arriving in Los Angeles, I need to rent a Ford near the airport. I will pick up the car at 21:00 on 2024-12-20 and return it at 21:00 on 2024-12-24. Check if the car provides snow chains, as there might be bad weather.

subtask_1.description: This subtask involves searching for the fastest flight from Dubai to Los Angeles on 2024-12-20 and confirming if the flight offers a vegetarian meal option. It includes obtaining the airport IDs of Dubai and Los Angeles, searching for the fastest flight, and retrieving detailed flight information.
Nodes: Search_Flights(fromId = "unknown(don't know Dubai airport fromId)", toId = "unknown(don't know Los Angeles airport toId)", departDate = "2024-12-20", sort = "FASTEST")
Get_Flight_Details(token = "unknown(need to retrieve from Search_Flights or Search_Flights_Multi_Stops API)")

subtask_2.description: This subtask focuses on checking the availability of a Ford rental car near Los Angeles airport for the specified dates and times, and confirming if the car provides snow chains. It includes finding the coordinates of the pick-up and drop-off locations near the airport and searching for the car rentals.
Nodes: Search_Car_Rentals(pick_up_latitude = "unknown(don't know the pick_up_latitude of the pick-up location near Los Angeles airport)", pick_up_longitude = "unknown(don't know the pick_up_longitude of the pick-up location near Los Angeles airport)", drop_off_latitude = "unknown(don't know the drop_off_latitude of the drop-off location near Los Angeles airport)", drop_off_longitude = "unknown(don't know the drop_off_longitude of the drop-off location near Los Angeles airport)", pick_up_date = "2024-12-20", drop_off_date = "2024-12-24", pick_up_time = "21:00", drop_off_time = "21:00", filters = "carCategory::Ford")

tools.name: Search_Flight_Location
tools.func_description: Find airports by their location, address, state, country, etc.

query.description: Names of airport, locations, cities, districts, places, countries, counties etc.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

fromId.description: From/Departure location Id. fromId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.

toId.description: To/Arrival location Id. toId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.

departDate.description:
Departure or travel date.
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

stops.description:
Filters flights based on the number of stops. Accepted values are:
none for no preference (returns flights with any number of stops)
0 for non-stop flights
1 for one-stop flights
2 for two-stop flights
If provided, the value must be either none, 0, 1, or 2.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

sort.description: This parameter orders result by BEST, CHEAPEST or FASTEST flights.

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

tools.name: Get_Flight_Details
tools.func_description: Search the detail information of flights, include: baggage allowances, airline meals, ticket price breakdown (taxes, discounts, baseFare) and insurance prices, etc.

token.description: token can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchFlights(Search Flights) or api/v1/flights/searchFlightsMultiStops(Search Flights Multi Stops) endpoints in Flights collection as token.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

options.disclaimer: Plan is issued by Cover Genius Insurance Services, LLC, includes insurance by US Fire and non-ins. services by On Call International. By clicking the button to select this coverage, I agree that I have read and agree to the Plan Terms.

content.subheader: Protect yourself from the unexpected. XCover's Travel Protection covers flight costs and more.
exclusions: Terms and exclusions apply. Claims and losses due to pre-existing medical conditions are not covered.
content.benefitsTitle: What’s covered by your travel insurance
content.closeA11y: Close and go back to the travel insurance overview section.
benefits: Medical and dental, emergency assistance and transportation while you’re abroad (international flight bookings only)
finePrint: This plan is issued by Cover Genius Insurance Services,

features.label: Possible to cancel flights, fees may apply

tools.name: Search_Car_Location
tools.func_description: Find car rental location by searching for their name, address, city, state, country, etc..

query.description: Names of locations, cities, districts, places, countries, counties etc.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

response_schema.name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, San Jose International Airport, CA

pick_up_latitude.description: The pick up location's latitude. pick_up_latitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as latitude inside coordinates object.

pick_up_longitude.description: The pick up location's longitude. pick_up_longitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as longitude inside coordinates object.

drop_off_latitude.description: The drop off location's latitude. drop_off_latitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as latitude inside coordinates object.

drop_off_longitude.description: The drop off location's longitude. drop_off_longitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as longitude inside coordinates object.

pick_up_time.description:
Pick up time
Format: HH:MM
Note: The format of time is 24 hours.

drop_off_time.description:
Drop off time
Format: HH:MM
Note: The format of time is 24 hours.

driver_age.description:
The driver's age. The default value is set to 30.
Note: The driver age must be in the range of 20 to 65 years.

filters.description:
Used to refine search results based on specific suppliers, car categories, or other attributes. Multiple filters can be applied by passing them as a comma-separated list in the following format:
::
For example:
supplier::Avis,supplier::Budget,carCategory::medium,carCategory::large
This will return results from Avis and Budget, and only cars in the medium and large categories.
To discover available filters, make a request to the /api/v1/cars/searchCarRentals endpoint and refer to the data → filter section in the response.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

location.description: location can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLocations(Get Location) endpoint in Meta collection.

accessibility.fuel_policy: Fuel policy is: Like for like
